skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

skillTree.localised_description: "Make sure those saddle straps are tight, boy, this isn't like falling off a normal horse."

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
This unit can fly.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Your horse is your lifeblood. You will not survive the battlefield, nor even the Reikwald, without it.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for Cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Come men, we will smash the enemy with the fury of our faith and the might of our Imperial steel!
As much as you or I don’t want to be shot, our horses, pegasi, and demigryphs want it even less; they don’t put the same religious or political import behind these battles.
The most decorated officers wear the finest armor, and none is finer than that crafted by our allies of the mountains.

These massive warbeasts are ferocious and powerfully built, standing larger than any Imperial Warhorse and are far more bloodthirsty in their murderous assault than any other creature of such noble heritage.

effects.description: Mount: Demigryph (not visible on campaign map)

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

skillTree.localised_description: There are numerous threats surrounding The Empire; rally the men against them, for soldiers are always more willing to fight when they are protecting their home.
These men are the backbone of the Imperial Army, and they are inspired to see their commanding officers join them on the frontline.
Every regiment and every man has a job to do on the battlefield. It is through our discipline and our training that we will find victory.
Every Imperial citizen has heard of us, and the finest recruits are honored to join our ranks.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As a graduate of the Imperial Colleges, this one is well versed in man-to-man combat. The principle has to be the same for man-to-Daemon, right?
This hardened warrior has learnt to not only protect themselves, but those around them also.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This one has seen his fair share of combat – more, even, which means he knows exactly how and when to deliver the deathblow.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +1 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +3 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +5 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!
"If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Stalwart and seasoned warriors, captains of the empire inspire their soldiers to fight with unyielding determination against the Emperor's enemies.
Stalwart and seasoned warriors, captains of the empire inspire their soldiers to fight with unyielding determination against the Emperor's enemies.

enabled_if: A Lord has died or is routed
